description: Development of a system for speech recognition (ASR) and text-based audio generation (TTS):
- development of high-load microservices;
- development of algorithms for correcting grammatical errors.
Development of a voice assistant to speed up office work:
- developed the entire server part of the project;
- participated in the development of the frontend part of the project;
- developed a system for testing speech recognition modules;
- developed formulas for evaluating the quality of speech recognition modules;
- developed an algorithm that minimizes the impact of speech defects on recognition quality;
- developed an algorithm for detecting multiple voice commands in a single recording;
- developed an algorithm for optimizing audio transmission in the system;
- performed a deploy of the entire system on the company's servers.
As a result, a minimally viable product was developed and a demo was recorded.
Development of information kiosks:
- developed the entire server and client side of the system;
- conducted testing and deployment on the user's devices;
- developed the design;
- worked with clients.
As a result, three systems have been developed and sold:
- for the BELAZ History Museum (Zhodino, Belarus);
- for the Court of the Eurasian Economic Union (Minsk, Belarus);
- for the Museum of Local Lore (Bereza, Belarus).
DevOps:
- administered three servers with Ubuntu Server OS;
- collected and deployed Docker containers;
- wrote works for Jenkins;
- deployed and configured GitLab, OpenLDAP, Jira.
Research work:
- participated in grants for the development of innovative products;
- participated in accelerating the execution of algorithms on supercomputers;
- developed programs for internal use of the department.
Student education:
- python programming language;
- machine learning;
- big data processing technologies.
Administration:
- computer assembly and maintenance;
- installation and configuration of LAN;
